name: Mythical Volcanum
description: Hurl a projectile of pure fire which fragments at the slightest touch.

name: Stonefather Mark
description: Create a fissure at the target area, slowing and stunning any enemies caught within it.

name: Badge of Mastery
description: Mastery of your preferred combat technique has taught you to find your target`s weak points and press the advantage.

name: Crest of Winter Fortitude
description: Unleash a surge of chilling energies at nearby foes.

name: Gildam Arcanum Commendation
description: "Commendation bestowed upon members of the Gildam Arcanum who look past the tensions between the Luminari and the Arcanists and choose to see the bigger picture: ensuring the survival of mankind."

name: Korvaak`s Brand
description: "Searing hot to mark loyal subjects."

name: Mark of the Dreadblade
description: Strike your foes with a tainted strike that petrifies flesh.

name: Mark of the Forbidden
description: "Symbol once forced upon heretics, later worn with pride by worshippers of the witch gods."

name: Pyroclasm Mark
description: Unleash a blazing fury from your guns. This is a ranged dual-wielding or two-handed technique that activates off of default weapon attacks. Also enables the ability to dual wield ranged weapons.

name: Sigil of the Bear King
description: "Sigil of King Ursal Benedict IV, also known as the Bear King."

name: Blood Sigil of Ch`Thon
description: Become empowered with the cataclysmic power of fire and brimstone.

name: Direwolf Crest
description: "Crest of the great white wolf, patron animal of the northern wastes."

name: Mark of Bloody Ends
description: A pool of filthy blood forms beneath your foes.

name: Mark of Calamitous Desires
description: "By a sovereign command."

name: Markovian`s Stratagem
description: "Named in honor of the famed tactician Markovian, this medal was awarded to only the most distinguished generals."

name: Undying Oath
description: Tear open a rift to the beyond, unleashing a well of restless spirits that will tear at any enemy that dares enter it.

name: Beastcaller`s Talisman
description: Whenever they see you harmed, your minions are thrown into a vengeful rage.

name: Dreadchill Mark
description: Launch a spike of rock solid ice to impale your enemies.

name: Mark of Anathema
description: A blaze of pure arcane fire erupts beneath your foes.

name: Mark of Dark Dreams
description: Fill the minds of nearby foes with chilling dreams of their imminent deaths.

name: Mark of Divinity
description: The light swells within you in times of trouble, helping you fight on when things are most grim.

name: Mark of Kalastor
description: Tear a fissure through the area underneath your foes, slowing and stunning any enemies caught within it.

name: Mark of Unlife
description: Being brought to the brink of death fills you with resilience of the undead.

name: Rotdrinker Crest
description: Infect your foes with a disease that rots the flesh away until nothing remains.

name: Serenir`s Commendation
description: "Commendation once given to High Inquisitor Serenir, who valiantly wielded the Horn of Gandarr to vanquish an occult coven singlehandedly."

name: Mark of Ulzuin
description: "Used by the faithful of Ulzuin to sear their flesh and dedicate themselves to the wrathful god."
